title: How do I customize the shortcut switches in the notification panel?
answer:
Open the notification panel and select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123023) to expand the shortcut switch list. 

 Step 1 Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123024) or ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123025) to customize the shortcut switches. 

 Step 1 Drag a shortcut switch to any position in the list to reorder the switches. 

 * This solution only applies to EMUI 2.3 and above.
keywords: notification panel, shortcut switches, shortcut icons
